formatted_address: 163 Tanglin Road, Unit, #03-128 Tanglin Mall, Singapore 247933
name: La Veranda

reviews.text: We were here for our afternoon cafe date. I can honestly say this cozy little spot is a true find. The atmosphere is warm and inviting—perfect for a relaxed meal or a quiet catch-up. Whether you’re a local or just passing through, this charming restaurant is well worth a visit.

A lovey, quaint and quiet restaurant tucked away in Tanglin Mall. Great salad options for lunch. I chose their 18 ingredient lunch - a bit pricey at $34 but well worth it. Pleasant service, homey and comfortable atmosphere.

The food is not the best for the price point and portions served but still, I really love this place! I have been back 2 times in a row - the atmosphere is simply lovely and cosy. The service by Han and his team was amazing as well. Came here to celebrate my birthday and he was incredibly attentive and made sure everything was served right. I will be back again! My favourite would be the chicken pasta and warm salad.

We've been here for lunch twice.  Food were very fresh, nice salads and great service from Han. We will surely go back again while we're in Singapore and try the other on the menu.
Thank you Han for great service.

Charming restaurant with a lovely rustic garden setting. Juicy steak frites cooked to my liking. Comfortable seating made it a great spot to chill on a Monday afternoon. Highly recommend for a relaxing afternoon retreat.
